The ZipArchive Library Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
CAesImplements AES encryption and decryption
CBytesWriterProvides implementation for various buffer operations depending on the current platform and configuration
CHmacImplements HMAC - the FIPS standard keyed hash function
CRandomPoolImplements a random data pool based on the use of an external entropy function
CSha1Implements a byte oriented version of SHA1 that operates on arrays of bytes stored in memory
CZipActionCallbackWhen you derive from CZipActionCallback, you can use the new class as a callback object when adding, extracting, deleting, testing files or saving the central directory
CZipAddNewFileInfoThe structure used as a parameter in CZipArchive::AddNewFile(CZipAddNewFileInfo& )
CZipAesCryptographPerforms AES encryption
CZipArchiveRepresents a zip archive file
CZipArchive::CWildcardA class used in the wildcard pattern matching
CZipArchive::CZipClbckStrgThe storage for callback objects
CZipArchive::CZipInternalInfoThe purpose of this structure is to hold the data that allow communication with the Zlib library
CZipArchive::CZipSmClrPassA structure for the internal use only
CZipAutoBufferA smart buffer freeing its contents on destruction
CZipCallbackA base class for callback objects that are notified when various actions take place
CZipCentralDirRepresents the central directory record in the archive
CZipCentralDir::CZipFindFastUsed in fast finding files by the filename
CZipCentralDir::InfoStores general information about the central directory
CZipCrc32CryptographPerforms the traditional zip encryption
CZipCryptographThe base class for cryptographs used in encryption and decryption of file data
CZipExceptionRepresents exceptions specific to the ZipArchive Library
CZipExtraDataRepresents a single data record in an extra field
CZipExtraFieldRepresents a local or central extra field in a zip archive
CZipFileHeaderRepresents a single file stored in a zip archive
CZipMemFileRepresents a file in memory
CZipPathComponentSplits a file path into components
CZipSpanCallbackWhen you derive from CZipSpanCallback, you can use the derived class as a callback object for the disk change notification
CZipStorageRepresents the storage layer for an archive
